name: ACR39U-N1MSR
description: A compact USB smart card reader with magnetic stripe support, suitable for authentication and secure access applications.

name: ACR39U Smart Card Reader
description: A reliable USB smart card reader designed for secure login, digital signatures, and identity verification.

name: ACR39U L1
description: An entry-level USB smart card reader for basic smart card authentication and desktop use.

name: LF USB Reader
description: A low-frequency USB reader commonly used for basic proximity and access control systems.

name: RFID ACR1281U-C1
description: A contactless RFID and NFC reader supporting secure transactions and access control applications.

name: NFC Reader
description: A contactless reader compatible with NFC cards and smartphones for tap-and-go interactions.

name: UHF Reader 6 Meter Range
description: A long-range UHF RFID reader designed for vehicle access, asset tracking, and logistics systems.

name: BT UHF Reader
description: A Bluetooth-enabled UHF reader for wireless RFID reading in mobile and handheld applications.

name: Proximity Mantra URF 001
description: A desktop biometric and proximity reader used for secure access and attendance systems.

name: Printer Head
description: High-precision replacement print head designed to restore optimal print quality and ensure sharp, consistent ID card printing performance.

name: Evolis Cleaing Kit
description: Official cleaning kit for Evolis card printers, designed to maintain print quality, extend printer life, and prevent dust-related issues.

name: Fargo Cleaning Kit
description: Genuine Fargo cleaning kit that ensures reliable printer performance by removing debris and maintaining consistent print output.

name: Zebra Cleaning Kit
description: Professional-grade cleaning kit for Zebra card printers, helping maintain peak performance and prolonging equipment lifespan.

name: IDP Solid Cleaning Kit
description: Specialized cleaning kit for IDP Solid printers, ensuring smooth operation and high-quality card printing results.

name: Printer Cleaning Pen
description: Easy-to-use cleaning pen for maintaining print heads and removing dust or residue to preserve print clarity.
